glsa.title: PgBouncer: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in PgBouncer, the worst of which may allow an attacker to bypass authentication.

background.p: PgBouncer is a lightweight connection pooler for PostgreSQL.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in PgBouncer. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker might send a specially crafted package possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker might bypass authentication in configurations using the “auth_user” feature.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PgBouncer users should upgrade to the latest version:
